long_description: The comfortable and adjustable Garmin VIRB shoulder harness mount secures your VIRB or VIRB Elite action camera to either shoulder, making it easy capture your entire adventure hands-free. Interlocking joints provide durable, anti-vibration locking performance by gripping in place instead of relying solely on tension.
short_description: The comfortable and adjustable Garmin VIRB shoulder harness mount secures your VIRB or VIRB Elite action camera to either shoulder, making it easy capture your entire adventure hands-free.
